__e: Well, I was right, Briggs, and this thing is bigger than I could have ever imagined.
They said they weren't allowed to see Mr. Briggs?
But you're close to Briggs, and that's a good place to start looking.
Did you really just come in here to ask me why Briggs chose me over you?
Briggs crowdfunded some cash to get us started, and, two years later, here we are, still trying to finish the damn thing.
Look, I know Briggs didn't leave town.
I'm not going to let you die in the living room, Mike, but I can't watch you play best friends with Briggs, not after what you told me.
And Mike, there's no one that would be happier than me to find out that Briggs isn't a criminal.
